MIN_LENGTH: The :field must be at least :min characters long
MAX_LENGTH: The :field must be at most :max characters long
FILE_REQUIRED: The file must be a valid File object.
ONLY_TXT_ALLOWED: Only files with the .txt extension are allowed.
FULL_NAME_REQUIRED: The name must include at least a first and last name.
USERNAME_INVALID: The username can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
